text: This game is flat out awesome and I recommend anyone to pick up a version of it (whether on Steam or PSP). For anyone looking for a good intro to this series, I would recommend this game. Ys Seven is very good as well, but I found that it contains a lot more "fluff" (boring cutscenes, etc) that distracts from the action. Both games have awesome combat systems and music.
